Articles.Content:
hey there anyone know anything about the ESP Solar panel? i keep getting a red light going toward the sun. its the direction the rays go but im not sure how to change it. I have been looking for a good extendable Solar panel add-on that can work with the ESP so i can use the Zoxygene mod. The ESP and Zoxygene mod works but i was hoping that it would look cleaner than a big lazer lol Thanks

Here's a image of what im talking about...
